s:workflowdescription.author: Alan R Williams
s:workflowdescription.title: Get web page from URL - just url

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Fetches a web page from http://www.mygrid.org.uk/tools using just the url parameter of the service. Note that when viewed, the HTML may not be rendered correctly. However, the HTML may be viewed by rendering the result as plain text.
